description: Creates a new  Facet in a schema. Facet creation is allowed only in development or applied schemas.

parameters.name: SchemaArn
parameters.description: The schema ARN in which the new  Facet will be created. For more information, see  arns.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the  Facet, which is unique for a given schema.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.description: The attributes that are associated with the  Facet. (dict) --- An attribute that is associated with the  Facet. The name of the facet attribute. AttributeDefinition (dict) --- A facet attribute consists of either a definition or a reference. This structure contains the attribute definition. See Attribute References for more information. The type of the attribute. DefaultValue (dict) --- The default value of the attribute (if configured). StringValue (string) --- A string data value. BinaryValue (bytes) --- A binary data value. BooleanValue (boolean) --- A Boolean data value. NumberValue (string) --- A number data value. DatetimeValue (datetime) --- A date and time value. IsImmutable (boolean) --- Whether the attribute is mutable or not. Rules (dict) --- Validation rules attached to the attribute definition. (string) --- (dict) --- Contains an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) and parameters that are associated with the rule. Type (string) --- The type of attribute validation rule. Parameters (dict) --- The minimum and maximum parameters that are associated with the rule. (string) --- (string) --- AttributeReference (dict) --- An attribute reference that is associated with the attribute. The target facet name that is associated with the facet reference. The target attribute name that is associated with the facet reference. RequiredBehavior (string) --- The required behavior of the FacetAttribute.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the facet attribute.

nested_params.name: AttributeDefinition
nested_params.description: A facet attribute consists of either a definition or a reference. This structure contains the attribute definition. See Attribute References for more information.

nested_params.name: DefaultValue
nested_params.description: The default value of the attribute (if configured).

nested_params.name: IsImmutable
nested_params.description: Whether the attribute is mutable or not.

nested_params.name: Rules
nested_params.description: Validation rules attached to the attribute definition.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: The type of attribute validation rule.

nested_params.name: Parameters
nested_params.description: The minimum and maximum parameters that are associated with the rule.

nested_params.name: AttributeReference
nested_params.description: An attribute reference that is associated with the attribute. See Attribute References for more information.

nested_params.name: TargetFacetName
nested_params.description: The target facet name that is associated with the facet reference. See Attribute References for more information.

nested_params.name: TargetAttributeName
nested_params.description: The target attribute name that is associated with the facet reference. See Attribute References for more information.

nested_params.name: RequiredBehavior
nested_params.description: The required behavior of the FacetAttribute.

parameters.name: ObjectType
parameters.description: Specifies whether a given object created from this facet is of type node, leaf node, policy or index. Node: Can have multiple children but one parent. Leaf node: Cannot have children but can have multiple parents. Policy: Allows you to store a policy document and policy type. For more information, see Policies. Index: Can be created with the Index API.
